item.title: Hello World
item.description: I don’t know why, but I want to have a blog long ago. I always have a vague idea of documenting little things that I learnt but never took action, or failed to complete the post and give up mid-way. TBH, I don’t know what will be posted here but by starting with this post I believe it is a good direction I’m heading. Still, I don’t know when and what I will post.
